Label: Art 5(12) Adequacy Decision
Description: Adequacy Decision permitting the transfer of data

Label: Art 12(e) Data Exchange Approval
Description: Explicit request or approval of the data subject or data holder to utilise additional specific tools for the purposes of facilitating exchange of data

Label: Art 31(3) Data Transfer Third Country Judgement
Art 2(6) Permission
Description: The legal basis justfiying processing of non-personal data based on the permission of an entity
Comment: dpv:LegalBasis needs to be divided into dpv:PersonalDataLegalBasis and dpv:NonPersonalDataLegalBasis

Label: Art 5(9) Permission for Transfer
Description: The legal basis justfiying processing of non-personal data based on the permission of an entity to transfer data
